game.name: Cats Hidden in China
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 중국 전역에 숨겨진 귀여운 고양이 100마리를 찾아보세요! 이 귀엽고 손으로 그린 숨은그림찾기 게임은 원조 바이럴 ‘숨은 고양이’ 게임의 창작자 Travellin Cats가 만들었습니다! 전부 찾을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 100 cats hiding in China in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: a hidden game which destroys your eyes.
Delightful. I have never in my personal history of game playing, smiled so much while playing a game. Its just a small , short, gentle little game, bu...
